name: Not a Hero (itch) (Starovoitov'S Workshop)
description:
Not a Hero — this is an action platformer combining fast-paced battles and fascinating exploration of locations. Not a Hero was designed for gameplay! We pay special attention to the precise control of movement and combat systems.

An exciting classic adventure in the world of dark fantasy with honed game mechanics, memorable enemies and retro aesthetics. Under your control is an adventurer who is trying to find his beloved. But between the Hero and his love lies a whole world filled with dangers!

Available in Google Play!


The core of Not a Hero is intense and exciting combats. You will fight and kill a variety of opponents. Each of them is unique in its own way and requires a special approach. Fights are balanced by the intervals of exploring locations - overcoming various obstacles and traps makes moving around the world no less acute than fights. Boss battles will force you to show all your skills acquired in the process.


  • More than ten large levels in the dark fantasy ambience, with an oppressive atmosphere, where danger lurks at every turn.
  • Hundreds of unique enemies and dozens of bosses.
  • Great attention is paid to the creation of pleasant combat mechanics and combo attacks, coupled with very responsive controls, visual effects.
  • PC experience on mobile platforms.

In this demo version, one location, ten enemies and two bosses are available. ENJOY!
